member.name: T:Umbraco.Forms.Core.Providers.WorkflowTypes.Slack
member.summary: Provides a to send the contents of a as a Slack notification.
member.remarks: This implementation supports only the older method of Slack integration using legacy tokens that can no longer be generated: https://api.slack.com/legacy/custom-integrations/legacy-tokens It is retained in case any clients have these tokens and are still using it. New implementations should use .
